channel.title: Npc cant drop phats in devolution v7?
channel.description:
when ever i add this to the code it gives me an error on my server not my compiler tho
[code]npcdrop = 1125 1046 1 1[/code]
this is end product
[code]npcdrop = 1125 3125 1 100 //Dad/jogre bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 1125 1163 1 1 //Dad/rune full helm/1 of it/2% chance drop. npcdrop = 1125 1201 1 1 //Dad/rune kiteshield/1 of it/2% chance drop. npcdrop = 1125 1127 1 1 //Dad/rune platebody/1 of it/2% chance drop. npcdrop = 1125 1079 1 1 //Dad/rune platelegs/1 of it/2% chance drop. npcdrop = 1125 1319 1 1 //Dad/rune 2h sword/1 of it/2% chance drop. npcdrop = 1125 1543 1 5 //Dad/red key/1 of it/5% chance drop. npcdrop = 1125 1201 1 5 npcdrop = 1125 4131 1 5 npcdrop = 1125 1333 1 5 npcdrop = 1125 1046 1 1 [/code]
